InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S3 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 3

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon the same size as the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: M4A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 2

The M4A is Behring's second tier laser autocannon. Its bigger size means more power consumption in exchange for packing a bigger punch. Fire rate and power efficiency are comparable to the M3A model.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S3 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:

InstalledItem.Name: M5A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 3

When energy autocannons are designed, Behring's M5A provides the standard to which they are measured against, owing to its long range of engagement and low damage fallout.

InstalledItem.Name: M5A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:

Size: 3

When energy autocannons are designed, Behring's M5A provides the standard to which they are measured against, owing to its long range of engagement and low damage fallout.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-447 Rhino Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 4

When a ship comes charging at you with a CF-447 Rhino strapped on, it is an experience few pilots will ever forget. This formidable size four laser repeater from Klaus & Werner is well suited for medium-range engagements, but packs a wallop up close.

InstalledItem.Name: Remote Turret
InstalledItem.Description: Remote Turret

InstalledItem.Name: SureGrip S2 Tractor Beam
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Tractor Beam
Max Angle: 60°
Max Range: 150 m
Full Strength Distance: 75 m

Backed by their certified Soft-Touch® guarantee, Greycat’s SureGrip tractor beam, is a mainstay of its product catalogue thanks to its dependable range and control.

InstalledItem.Name: Stronghold
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Basilisk 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Stronghold shield generator uses patented hull plating techniques to reinforce the generator’s body to make it one of the sturdiest on the market. That means the shield and component are both built to last.

The unique name for this stalwart industrial power plant was inspired by the nickname of a Juno Starwerk junior engineer who helped design it.

InstalledItem.Name: ThermalCore
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

When you’re in the middle of an important job, you don’t want to waste time wondering if your cooler is doing its part. Now you don’t have to. With the dependable mid-level ThermalCore cooler from Juno Starwerk onboard, you can take all the guesswork out of heat management.
